version_description:
Hi There

Thanks for your Feedback! On our newest update we included some nice feature and now you are able to import new Delay effects directly from BIAS Pedal. We have also improved the UI/UX of effect list.

Rock On!
Team Positive Grid

Rock On!
Team Positive Grid

Hi There

Rock On!
Team Positive Grid

Hi There

Thanks for your Feedback! On this new update we support importing our newly released BIAS Modulation effect in BIAS Pedal. We also fixed some minor bugs, including logging into ToneCloud, restoring presets from Dropbox, and editing custom amp of ToneCloud preset in BIAS Amp. Also now the app correctly shows the required expansion pack name when activating an unpurchased effect.

Rock On!
Team Positive Grid

Hi There

Thanks for your feedback. On our newest update we already fixed issues some you could experience before like high screech distortion problem when switching presets and noise problems with amps imported from BIAS Amp. We also fixed some some crash issues when loading presets. And also other minor bug fixed.

Rock On
Team Positive Grid

Hi There,

Thanks for your feedback. On this update we fixed some issues of our previous version like the Pitch Shifter display problem, the S-Booster save preset with the chosen type problem and the BPM On / Off switch reversed bug in Ping Pong Delay effect. Thanks to this update now also BIAS Pedal stereo effects can remain stereo in BIAS FX and The thumbnails of imported BIAS Amp preset will be correct on dual path.

Rock on,
Team Positive Grid

Our Black Friday Promotion begins now, please check out: https://www.positivegrid.com/promotions/ for more information.

Hi there,

This update brings you the latest performance improvements and bug fixes that include:

- The BPM value can now be saved properly
- The EQ Compensation status can now be saved properly
- Combo Preamp and Stack Poweramp UI are now highlighted correctly when selected
- The Gain and Low Gain knobs for Ola War amp now behave correctly
- Minor performance improvements

This update also includes DSP enhancements that improve the sonic attributes of the following effects/pedals:

- Octaver (for BIAS FX Std)
- Bass Octave (for Bass Expansion Pack)
- Poly Octaver (for BIAS FX Pro)
- Pitch Shifter (for BIAS FX Pro)
- Fuzz Arsenal (BIAS FX Pro)
- Ambient Reverb (for BIAS FX Pro)

Rock On!
The Positive Grid Team

Hi there,

The latest update contains the following bug fixes:

- Balance controls (L/R) on Stereo Reverb Rack are no longer inverted
- MIX knob now works properly on the Ping-Pong Chorus Delay Pedal
- Q knob on Poly Octaver now works as intended with MIDI

Rock on,
The Positive Grid Team

We are happy to announce the release of an upgraded version of BIAS FX guitar effects processing app that now works on both iPhone and iPad.

Now guitarists can turn their iOS devices into a world-class guitar amps and effects processor. The BIAS FX mobile app will come stocked with two free amps and eight effects with six factory presets, all ready to rock with ultra-low latency. Users can purchase two new amps and effects packs to add even more analog-sounding amps, guitar pedals and high def stereo rack effects.

The Starter License includes an additional 3 amps, 8 effects and 12 presets. The Essential License includes everything from the Starter License and more for a total of 12 drool-worthy boutique amp models, 30 stunning effects and 50 factory presets. Now you can have thousands of dollars of gear at the touch of a fingertip.

The BIAS FX universal app includes incredibly versatile, high-quality effects from vintage pedal simulations to newly added high-end rack effects. All effects are designed to work with BIAS FX’s easy-to-use, photo-realistic, drag and drop interface to dial in tone just like on analog studio gear.

Built on the backbone of the most advanced amps and effects engine in the industry, the BIAS FX app draws its power from the original, award-winning BIAS FX software, available for PC/Mac. Packed with a library of hyper-authentic, touch responsive amplifier circuits, it also includes a new speaker cabinet module and a studio-quality collection of amazing sounds and pre-sets. “Delays, choruses, flangers, vibratos, tremolos, all that is available in BIAS FX. Whatever it is that your style requires, it’s all there for you,” shares Stephen Carpenter of the Deftones.

Stocked with a built-in tuner and metronome, the BIAS FX universal app supports MIDI control and has a LIVE view for easy on-stage control. The Global setting makes amp control fast and precise.

The BIAS FX mobile app also allows users to connect to our ToneCloud, where players can find thousands of amps and effects configurations created by artists, producers and engineers from all over the world. Settings can be downloaded and shared in a snap. Marc Holcomb of Periphery can’t get enough. “The quality of the tones you get out of this thing are unbelievable,” he shares.

Stay tuned with us at www.positivegrid.com, more is coming!

Rock On!
The Positive Grid Team

This quick update consists of the following bug fixes:

- "Upload to ToneCloud" window will now scale correctly when the keyboard display is opened (for iPhone devices)
- Global Output settings can now be saved properly (for iPhone devices)
- Tapping "Restore Purchase" will now show the correct status for each in-app purchase

Rock On!
The Positive Grid Team

Rock On!
The Positive Grid Team

In this latest update, we offer a new “All-In Bundle” for those of you that wish to get all the seven Expansion Packs at a discount price! Please go check it out at the in-app Store Page.

This update also consists of the following changes:

Improvements:
- On-screen tooltips for better functionality awareness.
- Expansion Pack presets are now preview-able with audio clips provided at the in-app Store Page. (Please tap on “View Detail”)
- ToneCloud presets are now preview-able regardless of what license/packs user owns.

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed the issue of random crash at first-launch.

The Positive Grid Team

This update consists of the following changes:

Improvements:
- We now add a “RESTORE PURCHASE” function under the SPECIAL OFFER tab at the in-app Store Page. BIAS FX Mobile previous owner now can restore all the features and purchased IAP in a tap on a button.
- iOS Audio Interface tooltip and tutorial.

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed the crash issue with BIAS AMP 2 integration.

This update consists of the following important changes:

Improvements:
- We have solved the latency issue between preset changes!
- BIAS FX Mobile Universal can now auto-detect and follow the sample rate from any audio interface. This can resolve sample rate mismatch issues.

Bug Fixed:
- Fixed imported BIAS Pedal Delay feedback decay issues.

Rock On!
The Positive Grid Team

This update consists of the following changes:

Improvements:
- BIAS FX Mobile Universal can now set up to 8 input channels! This can resolve instrument input channel issue with some audio interfaces.

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed the random crash issue when re-ordering preset in the Preset Menu, and opening the “Special Offer” tab in the in-app Store Page.
- Input/Output volume can now be saved properly in AudioBus.
- CPU Usage info will now display correctly on iPhone 5/5s/SE.

Rock On!
The Positive Grid Team

This update consists of the following changes:

Improvements:
- AMP menu is now re-arranged by categories. We also have added BIAS AMP category for all imported/edited custom amps from BIAS AMP 2.

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed the preset menu delete/cancel behavior.
- Fixed the random crash issue when loading preset.

This update consists of the following changes:

Improvements:
- We now add a Public Announcement system in our BIAS FX Mobile Universal app to make sure all of you get Positive Grid newest updates and promotions. For more info, please go to the “Settings” menu and tap on “News”.
- Metronome is now enhanced with a blinking icon when turned on to improve visibility.

Bug Fixes:
- You can now mute the Metronome by setting the volume to zero.

Rock On!
The Positive Grid Team

Hi there!

In this update, we offer a new “Amp Arsenal Pack” for all guitar and bass players who desire to add more good sounding and versatile amps to their collection! (For more info, please go to the “Special Offer” in the in-app Store Page)

This update also consists of the following changes:

Improvements:
- We have re-designed the “delete” function for imported amps and pedals from BIAS AMP 2 & BIAS Pedal. Both manageable from the AMP & EFFECT menu.

Bug Fixes:
- No more random crash when changing presets.
- Fixed the output issue when running through IAA in Audibus 2&3.

Merry Christmas and keep rockin’!
The Positive Grid Team

Happy New Year 2019!

BIAS FX Mobile Universal is now available in Chinese (Traditional & Simplified) version!
BIAS FX Mobile Universal 現在有中文 (簡/繁) 版本了！

This update also consists of the following changes:

Improvements:
- We hear you! The stereo input selection is now available, and the app will remember the input setting from the last connection with your audio interface!
- You can now disable Public Announcement notifications from the Settings Menu. Please check out the new notification icon on the top bar so you won’t miss any great news from Positive Grid!

Rock On!
The Positive Grid Team
